attributes.action: Overhall the care system in our mental health hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my sister is currently in such a place and at no point on arrival were we asked who we were, if we had anything we shouldn't, on speaking to other residents  they are just left to get on with it, some are still waiting for test results form several weeks ago.the general lack of inpatient support in such places needs to be looked at
